workzen.xgen.loader
Class WebsiteFilesystemLoader

java.lang.Object
  workzen.xgen.loader.WebsiteFilesystemLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILoader
public class WebsiteFilesystemLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILoader

This class walks the filesystem, and builds a Site using the existing filesystem structure.

Author:
brad.matlack
